post:
A few weeks ago there were some threads about backup plans and I really didn't see why there was so much interest in them... but decided to poll my clients and was pretty surprised by the amount of people wanting them. So much so, that I'm going to only offer storage plans for a while. If you're interested, I've started a waiting list and will notify you when a new node is launched. I filled up a node tonight in about two hours after emailing my clients and will probably fill up one more before I notify people on the public waiting list. So keep in mind that it might be 1-2 weeks before you get an email saying there are open spots. Anyway...

The cheapest plan is detailed below:

**PLAN: BKUP-1**
Disk Space - 150 GB
RAM - 256 MB
Bandwidth - 1000 GB
IP Addresses - One
Price: $7.00/month

Test IP: 204.152.38.84
Datacenter: Wholesale Internet and Datashack (Kansas City)
Support Type: Unmanaged
VPS Panel: BoxCtrl-VZ
Virtualization: OpenVZ

Storage plans may only be used for storing data, nothing else. More information is on http://zensix.com and the waiting list can be found here: http://zensix.com/waiting-list.php
